function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Problems with musculoskeletal health due to teleworking conditions","Impact":"Affecting the physical health and well-being of workers","Mitigation":"Provide ergonomic workstations and encourage regular breaks and movement","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture, standing desks, posture-correction reminders","People":"Teleworkers","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Psychological problems and stress associated with teleworking","Impact":"Impacting mental health and emotional well-being of workers","Mitigation":"Offer mental health support, counseling, and stress management resources","Technologies":"Tele-mental health platforms, employee assistance programs, stress management apps","People":"Teleworkers","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Inadequate home workspaces impacting health and productivity","Impact":"Affecting physical health, sleep quality, and work performance","Mitigation":"Provide guidance on setting up ergonomic home workspaces and offer financial support for equipment","Technologies":"Remote ergonomic assessments, telecommuting equipment subsidies","People":"Teleworkers","Owner":"Employers"}]}
